description: Challenges considered will include pesticides, plastics, pharmaceuticals, food waste, genetically modified crops, and food certification. Six student teams will be formed in each of these areas to: 1) define the problem; 2) assess the legal context; 3) analyse economic benefits and costs; 4) evaluate scientific evidence of risks to health and environment; 5) consider ethical concerns; 6) propose public and/or private sector solutions.
title: Short Course: Future of Food - Global Challenges
